title: "Plot Types"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(rbiom)

biom <- rarefy(hmp50)

bdiv_boxplot(
  biom     = biom, 
  x        = "==Sex", 
  bdiv     = c("Bray-Curtis", "Euclidean"), 
  facet.by = list("==Body Site" = c("Buccal mucosa", "Saliva")) )

```
